isis.stitle: BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE AND LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE - ASSEMBLE - LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE

svcproc.title: LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 16 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Before assembly, lubricate O-rings, pistons, and body and cover bores with the lubricant in the Bendix maintenance kit.
Install O-rings (Items 3 and 4) on proportioning piston (Item 12). Install O-rings (Items 2 and 4) on blend back piston (Item 14). Install O-ring (Item 1) on cover (Item 9).

Place inlet/exhaust valve (Item 5) into the inner diameter of the proportioning piston (Item 12) and retain with valve spring (Item 6). Use needle nose pliers to install the valve spring (Item 6) by grasping it on the bar that intersects its end and turning clockwise while pressing down. The bar must be away from (not touching) the valve.

note.para: Make sure spring coils do not overlap each other as the spring compresses into the proportioning piston. Also, make sure the piston is square, contacts the seat, and doesn't bind.

step1.para: Insert the proportioning piston (Item 12) into the small bore of the blend back piston (Item 14) and install the piston assembly in the body (Item 13).
Insert the spring seat (Item 11) into the blend piston assembly bore, small end first.
Install the "initial delivery spring" (Item 15) on the inner wall of the spring seat (Item 11).
Install the blend back spring (Item 10) in the inner diameter of the blend back piston (Item 14) so that it surrounds the "initial delivery spring" (Item 15).
Place the cover (Item 9) on the body (Item 13) in the proper position, as marked in DISASSEMBLE, step 2,. Make sure the springs are square when the cover is attached to the body.
Use the (4) Phillips head screws (Item 8) and their lockwashers to secure the cover to the body. Tighten the screws to 50 to 80 in-lbs. (5.6 to 9.0 N•m).
Install all air line fittings, making sure thread sealing material does not enter the valve.
Mount the LQ-5 on the vehicle.
